name: Fidget Spinning
description:
Come see why the Fidget Spinning device is so famous! It's super fun, and taking the internet by storm! Spin as fast as you can, unlock new Spinners and share your score with your friends!

Relax yourself turning and moving the hand spinner. Includes very realistic effects of sound and vibration. Try to beat your best time or rpm (revolutions per minute)!
Collect all the different Fidget Spinners. Some will have to be unlocked using coins earn from your spinning, but don't worry, playing with your spinner and get coins to unlock more spinner
The game has statistics where you can see your best records as well as the total spins you have achieved.

CUSTOMIZATION
You can customize some features of the game (from the settings option):
* Play or mute the sounds and volume.
* Language.
* Device orientation.

Just one more thing...
RELAX AND ENJOY !!!

f8ae1c2c81
